# Our Mission Statement

The Florida Agricultural Legacy Learning Center was founded in 1983 to preserve Florida’s agricultural past, interpret agricultural issues of yesterday, today and tomorrow, and educate the public about those issues through enjoyable experiences. It exists for the benefit of and through the support of the citizens of the State of Florida.
admission_text:
Our members value and support the mission of The Florida Agricultural Legacy Learning Center, our educational programs and the preservation of Florida’s historic sites, artifacts, stories and heritage livestock and plants.

[DOWNLOAD MEMBERSHIP APPLICATION [PDF]](https://www.floridaagmuseum.org/wp-content/uploads/2022/09/AM-FL-Membership-06-1.pdf) | [JOIN/RENEW MEMBERSHIP) ONLINE](https://floridaagriculturalmuseum.regfox.com/membership)

STANDARD BENEFITS:  
• Free Museum Tours all year (All members need reservation for admission)  
• Discount to select special events  
• Discount on Gift Shop purchases  
• Members able to add on special events/activities to online reservations  
• Annual “Members Only” Event  
• Welcome packet

SUPPORTER LEVEL:

Individual Membership $35

Includes standard benefits for one person

• 10% gift shop discount

…………………………………………………………

Family Membership $75

Includes standard benefits for up to 2 adults and 4 children

• 10% gift shop discount

…………………………………………………………

Red Ribbon Membership $150  
Includes all standard benefits for up to 2 adults and 4 children PLUS:  
• 10% one-time facility rental discount (Monday through Thursday)  
• Unlimited Museum Tours for 4 people for a year  
• 2 Guest passes for Museum Tours for one time use  
• 15% gift shop discount  
• NARM

…………………………………………………………

Blue Ribbon Membership $300

Includes all standard benefits for up to 6 people PLUS:  
• 20% one-time facility rental discount (Monday through Thursday)  
...
